column1: 48179391$The Seal of Orichalcos$$SPELL$$$$$$$$$Field$$$All monsters you control gain 500 ATK. Once per turn
column2: this card cannot be destroyed by card effects. While you control 2 or more face-up Attack Position monsters
column3: your opponent cannot target your monster(s) with the lowest ATK for an attack. If this card is activated: Destroy all Special Summoned monsters you control. You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck. You can only activate "The Seal of Orichalcos" once per Duel.$$$$$
